attributes.action: To allow the whole country to vote for London mayor position,
attributes.additional_details: London is the British capital city , the nation as a whole should be allowed the opportunity to vote for its mayor,
attributes.background: To make it a right for the whole of the UK to be able to vote for the mayoral position of our capital city

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715511
